item.title: How to prepare Windows 10 1607 image
item.description: Sooner or later every company will come to the point when using standard Windows image is just not enough. Manual installation, fetching all updates or installing software etc. etc. takes time, and in IT, we really can use that time for somethingÂ way more productive.
